plot: When Bigfoot is discovered dead, all of the evidence points to Magnus. Will, Henry, and Kate must find a way to clear her name and find out who actually committed the crime before she is replaced.

Will returns home to find the big guy in the morgue and Dr. Magnus stands accused of the crime. Will's done the insanity tango with Helen before, but will he be able to piece together the clues this time - before the entire Sanctuary network falls into the wrong hands?—SciFiChick81
